trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sandy Springs
There were no other sightings in Sandy Springs on or around March 18th 2010
divs: Sighting Details My buddy and i were Driving i was in passenger seat he was driving we were west bound on Johnson Ferry Rd west of Bridge and of Evergreen Rd on the hill looking south west for at least 1 minute at object. Object about 2 miles away. Looked like a smile like the moon but it was facing the wrong way to be the moon. The object was still and motionless. it was like a golden orange smile low on the south west horizon. Clear night could see the complete sky with stars. we lost it in the treeline then could not find it again. We tried to look for it after we saw it drove up to hospital and all high points in area to try to find it could not find object after initial Sighting on Johnson Ferry RD Incedent lasted about 15 Minutes in total from initail sighting to end of search. It was kinda cool and exciting at first but then i got a little nervous then was fine after a while it was also disaponting we could not get close. I have seen a UFO up close before and reported it.
Summary: Moon like object like smile Golden Orange low on horizon
